mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.table_id AS tableId, o.people_count AS peopleCount, o.waiter, o.total_amount AS totalAmount, o.status, o.order_time AS orderTime, o.payment_time AS paymentTime, o.completion_time AS completionTime, o.notes, t.table_number AS tableNumber, t.table_image AS tableImage, t.table_address AS tableAddress, t.table_type AS tableType FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN table_info t ON o.table_id = t.id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT o.id, o.table_id AS tableId, o.people_count AS peopleCount, o.waiter, o.total_amount AS totalAmount, o.status, o.order_time AS orderTime, o.payment_time AS paymentTime, o.completion_time AS completionTime, o.notes, t.table_number AS tableNumber, t.table_image AS tableImage, t.table_address AS tableAddress, t.table_type AS tableType FROM orders o JOIN table_info t ON o.table_id = t.id WHERE o.status = #{orderTableInfoDTO.status} AND o.order_time = #{orderTableInfoDTO.orderTime} AND t.table_number = #{orderTableInfoDTO.tableNumber};
